user.title: Alterego Authentication
user.description: Enter your Alterego credentials to access the temperature/VMC control system.

station.title: Select Station
station.description:
Enter your station ID (serial number).

Example: DOT_XXXXXXXX

You can enter multiple station IDs separated by commas to test which ones are accessible.

You can find the station ID in the Alterego app or control panel.

data_description.station_id: The serial number(s) of your Alterego station(s), separated by commas if multiple (e.g., DOT_XXXXXXXX or DOT_XXXXXXXX, DOT_YYYYYYYY)

station_select.title: Select Station
station_select.description: Found {count} available station(s). Please select the one you want to configure.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
error.invalid_station: Invalid station ID or station not accessible. Please verify that the ID is correct and you have access to this station.
